item.title: If You Vote in Kirkwood School District, Listen Up
item.description:
In the past 15 years, Kirkwood School Districts operation costs have skyrocketed almost 100 percent. But the people paying the taxes for that district have seen a cost of living increase of only 44 percent.
Obviously, at some point, the system will crash. Unless you do something now. On April 2, you can elect two fiscally responsible members to the board of education. Eric Peterson and Amy Russell Here’s what you should do:
